verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O my soul, though you be cast down
You shall yet praise your God.
Though weeping endure all through the night,
Joy comes in the waking light.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will arise, I will arise,
I will arise and bless my God;
I will arise, I will arise,
I will arise and bless my God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Out of my darkness, into His light,
There is no turning back.
For if I fall, I shall arise
And turn again to my God.
